医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
乳房X光检查人工智能可能会让患者付出额外的费用。这值得么？ 11 月份，当我在曼哈顿的一家放射诊所办理年度乳房 X 光检查时，审核我的文件的前台工作人员提出了一个意想不到的问题：我愿意花 40 美元对我的乳房 X 光检查进行人工智能分析吗？她补充说，这不在保险范围内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Mammography-AI-can-cost-患者-extra-Is-it-worth-it.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Mammography-AI-can-cost-患者-extra-Is-it-worth-it.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9224823b-7a3c-4d21-8530-45656fe0f651 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:15:36 -0500 Mammography AI can cost patients extra. Is it worth it?
加州为找不到堕胎培训的住院医生提供了生命线布里亚·皮科克（Bria Peacock）选择了医学职业，因为这位佐治亚州黑人本地人看到了她所在社区的严峻健康需求——包括获得堕胎护理的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/California-offers-a-lifeline-for-medical-residents-who-cane28099t-find-abortion-training.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/California-offers-a-lifeline-for-medical-residents-who-cane28099t-find-abortion-training.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f8c58b0-c9d4-4ad9-a69b-b236668f30d4 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:14:19 -0500 California offers a lifeline for medical residents who can’t find abortion training
新算法被证明是检测和识别新型细菌生物体的强大工具研究人员开发了 NOVA 算法，使用传统方法（例如基质辅助激光解吸电离飞行时间质谱法和使用全基因组测序的部分 16S rRNA 基因测序）系统分析未鉴定的细菌分离株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-algorithm-proves-to-be-a-powerful-tool-for-detection-and-identification-of-novel-bacterial-organisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-algorithm-proves-to-be-a-powerful-tool-for-detection-and-identification-of-novel-bacterial-organisms.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6067456a-ad5a-4e60-8f1a-267264061359 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 07:00:00 -0500 New algorithm proves to be a powerful tool for detection and identification of novel bacterial organisms
研究表明芒果可减弱抗结肠癌的潜力芒果苷 (MF)（芒果）的化学预防潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-reveals-mangos-attenuates-pottial-against-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-reveals-mangos-attenuates-pottial-against-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1462afa8-a05d-4882-a87d-4d32ad3193ee Wed, 10 Jan 2024 06:53:00 -0500 Study reveals mangos attenuates potential against colon cancer
evosep 的新进展使临床蛋白质组学的稳健性提高 100 倍，速度提高 10 倍摩根大通医疗保健会议 –（2024 年 1 月 8 日）基于质谱的蛋白质组学样品制备解决方案的领先供应商 Evosep 今天宣布与全球科学服务领导者 Thermo Fisher Scientific 达成联合营销协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-developments-at-evosep-to-make-clinical-proteomics-100x-more-robust-and-10x-faster.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-developments-at-evosep-to-make-clinical-proteomics-100x-more-robust-and-10x-faster.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a50ea45-b804-463a-898c-c6da8b32e2a4 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 06:50:00 -0500 New developments at evosep to make clinical proteomics 100x more robust and 10x faster
具有里程碑意义的研究在最大的荟萃分析中证实了帕金森病的五个关键变异大规模队列中罕见的帕金森病 (PD) 变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Landmark-study-confirms- Five-key-Parkinsons-Disease-variants-in-largest-meta-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Landmark-study-confirms- Five-key-Parkinsons-Disease-variants-in-largest-meta-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ada8d46-cca5-47d0-be38-1d6030ee96b0 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 05:00:00 -0500 Landmark study confirms five key Parkinson's Disease variants in largest meta-analysis
尼古丁信念会引起人脑的剂量反应反应研究人员调查与尼古丁相关的信念是否可能以类似于药物作用的剂量依赖性方式影响大脑过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Nicotine-beliefs-elicit-dose-response-reactions-in- human-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Nicotine-beliefs-elicit-dose-response-reactions-in- human-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ed5b34b-d991-4d16-9aa6-ec884b202d5d Wed, 10 Jan 2024 04:08:00 -0500 Nicotine beliefs elicit dose-response reactions in human brains
使用助听器可降低患有听力障碍的成年人的死亡率研究人员确定了美国听力障碍成年居民使用助听器与死亡率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Hearing-aid-usage-linked-to-reduced-mortality-in-adults-with-hearing-impairments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Hearing-aid-usage-linked-to-reduced-mortality-in-adults-with-hearing-impairments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b47eddf-5abd-41af-ada8-b830534252ab Wed, 10 Jan 2024 03:54:00 -0500 Hearing aid usage linked to reduced mortality in adults with hearing impairments
昆士兰大学研究人员发起世界上最大的药物调查昆士兰大学的研究人员发起了世界上最大的毒品调查，以深入了解全球的毒品使用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/UQ-researchers-launch-the-worlds-biggest-drug-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/UQ-researchers-launch-the-worlds-biggest-drug-survey.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04a2576e-2d33-453b-8565-9766ed283d12 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:49:00 -0500 UQ researchers launch the world's biggest drug survey
蛋白质秘密揭晓：单分子光谱学迎来个性化医疗时代使用基于近场光学显微镜的先进测量技术观察单个蛋白质的红外振动光谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Protein-secrets-revealed-Single-molecule-spectroscopy-ushers-in-era-of-personalized-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Protein-secrets-revealed-Single-molecule-spectroscopy-ushers-in-era-of-personalized-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=568b700f-f1c4-498a-b49d-ac3395974e29 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 23:46:19 -0500 Protein secrets revealed: Single-molecule spectroscopy ushers in era of personalized medicine
